mapper.insert: INSERT INTO candidate (voted_status, member_id, election_id, opinion, champion) VALUES (#{votedStatus}, #{memberId}, #{electionId}, #{opinion}, #{champion})
mapper.update: UPDATE candidate SET voted_status = #{votedStatus}, member_id = #{memberId}, election_id = #{electionId}, opinion = #{opinion}, champion = #{champion} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT id AS candidate_id, voted_status, member_id, election_id, opinion, champion FROM candidate
